definitions.explanation_en: A surname of Scottish and English origin, commonly found in North America and the United Kingdom. It is a patronymic name derived from the given name Donald, meaning 'world ruler' or 'mighty ruler'.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自苏格兰和英格兰的姓氏，常见于北美和英国，为父名姓氏，由名字 Donald 派生而来，意为‘世界的统治者’或‘强大的统治者’。
definitions.example_en: Dr. Donaldson published groundbreaking research on climate change in the journal Nature.
definitions.example_cn: 唐纳德森博士在《自然》期刊上发表了关于气候变化的开创性研究。
